ygData.subject: Int items.
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a 17 necromancer. What is the suggested +int item for each slot for a necromancer (non-planar)?  I have a 33 ranger, so obtaining them may not be TOO much
ygData.messageBody:
I am a 17 necromancer.

What is the suggested +int item for each slot for a necromancer
(non-planar)? I have a 33 ranger, so obtaining them may not be TOO much of
a problem. Also, what are the stats on the harvester? I assume it's a
2hand item. If so, would it be better to complete the jeweled skull quest
and have the following weapon slot configuration:

Jeweled Skull
Stein of Moggok
Dagger of Marnek

Any help is appreciated, thanks.

Telethorn/Zarbon
